patthana24.9:4.1: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:5.1: Nahetuṃ nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.9:6.1: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:7.1: Nahetuṃ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:7.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.9:8.1: Nanahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:9.1: Nahetuṃ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:9.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … sahajāte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.9:10.1: Nanahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:11.1: Nahetuṃ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:11.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … sahajāte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.9:12.1: Nahetuṃ nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:14.1: Nahetuṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:15.1: Nahetuṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:15.2: Nanahetuṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:15.3: Nahetuṃ naaraṇañca nanahetuṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.9:15.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
